c98c1840-61a3-4675-803d-195e7d6cf7d6.description: The earner of this credential is complete the program of Intelligence Unit in Tankyu Intelligence Program. The earner able to handle information on ESG OSINT, which includes global dynamics of rule-making trend, utilizing RuleWatcher.
c98c1840-61a3-4675-803d-195e7d6cf7d6.name: Tankyu Intelligence Program - Intelligence Unit

issuer.summary: issued by Tankyu Intelligence Center (managed by OSINTech Inc.)

entity.name: Tankyu Intelligence Center (managed by OSINTech Inc.)

badge_template_activities.title: Attend Intelligence Unit of Tankyu Intelligence Program, weekly full-online sessions. Submission of the assignments(exceed certain criteria) and active engagement required. (Now the program only holds in Japanese)

bea42505-5d7f-449a-92b7-55cbd803f83d.description: The earner of this credential is able to refine their plans for their business, policy making, or NGO, by conducting a process of testing their own hypotheses and perform enthusiastic presentations.
bea42505-5d7f-449a-92b7-55cbd803f83d.name: Tankyu Intelligence Program - Tankyu Practice Unit

issuer.summary: issued by Tankyu Intelligence Center (managed by OSINTech Inc.)

entity.name: Tankyu Intelligence Center (managed by OSINTech Inc.)

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 6-month long, weekly full-online sessions. Graduate from the course with presenting his / her own Tankyu(Inquiry-based) project. (Now only open to Japanese people since the program holds in Japanese). Their final presentation needs to exceed certain standard.

1cc9826b-01c2-4e75-9ddc-0ca055479fbe.description: The earner of this credential is able to handle information on ESG OSINT, which includes global dynamics of rule-making trend, utilizing RuleWatcher, to lead the discussion proactively to make an agreement among various sectors, and to put the insights of into practice to contribute to the sustainable society. The earner is also able to refine their plans for their business, policy making, or NGO, by conducting a process of testing their own hypotheses and perform enthusiastic presentations.
